title: Mr.Time : Monochrono
developerAddress: 2F, J Studio, 28, Donggyo-ro 25-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea, 03993
description: *This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps. This watch's name is 'Monochrono'. [Mr.Time Watchface Series]Now provides the most basic design of analog and chronograph watches.More different designs will be updated soon.*Tap : watch theme change
descriptionHTML:
*This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps.

This watch's name is 'Monochrono'.

[Mr.Time Watchface Series]
Now provides the most basic design of analog and chronograph watches.
More different designs will be updated soon.

*Tap : watch theme change
comments: A really nice looking watch face, but sadly the resolution is low, making the whole think look slightly blurry. The ambient display is also painfully bland with no option to display anything other than the basic hands. Instantly uninstalled.
